name: forgesyte-yolo-tracker
description: YOLO-based football analysis tools for ForgeSyte.
author: ForgeSyte Contributors

tools.name: yolo_player_detection
tools.description: Detect football players in a frame using YOLO.

tools.name: yolo_player_tracking
tools.description: Track football players across frames using YOLO + ByteTrack.

tools.name: yolo_ball_detection
tools.description: Detect and track the football using YOLO.

tools.name: yolo_team_classification
tools.description: Classify players into teams based on jersey colors.

tools.name: yolo_pitch_detection
tools.description: Detect pitch keypoints and lines using YOLO.

tools.name: yolo_radar
tools.description: Generate radar view of player positions on the pitch.
